attributes.action: Goverment to ascertain the origins of monies (illegal/corruption/money laundering sourced) used by foreign Investors to buy properties in London
attributes.additional_details: I wish the Goverment to consider ascertaining whether the monies used by Foriegn Investors to buy properties in London and the home counties has been appropriated legally and is not the proceeds of illegal activity i.e corruption/money laundering. Some of the current investors are from countries in which the general population are relatively poor and so the vast wealth of some is questionable. Being able to buy properties in London with such ill gotten gains is morally suspect
